secs since last heartbeat
func:
bts = msg.payload
last = bts.last_heartbeat
millis = Date.now() - last  
return {payload:millis/ 1000}

name: make command
remove active
func:
name = global.get("active_vehicle")
vs = global.get("vehicles")
if(name in vs){
    vs[name].bt_state.last_heartbeat = null
    global.set("active_vehicle", "")
    msg.payload = "Vehicle "+ name + " timed out"
    return msg
}

name: set active if first
adjust min/max
special map icons
info:
plane : a jet plane icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    smallplane : a light aircraft icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    ship : a ship icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    car : a car icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    bus : a bus/coach icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    uav : a small uav like icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    helicopter : a small helicopter icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    arrow : a map GPS arrow type pointer that aligns with the heading of travel.
    wind : a wind arrow that points in the direction the wind is coming FROM.
    satellite : a small satellite icon.
    iss : a slightly larger icon for the ISS.
    locate : a 4 corner outline to locate a point without obscuring it.
    friend : pseudo NATO style blue rectangle. (see NATO SIDC option below)
    hostile : pseudo NATO style red circle.
    neutral : pseudo NATO style green square.
    unknown : pseudo NATO style yellow square.
    earthquake : black circle - diameter proportional to msg.mag.

name: List mission plans
select and return plan
func:
gs = global.get("gui_state")
mplans = global.get("mission_plans")
mplan = mplans[msg.payload.title]
gs.selected_plan = mplan

return {payload:mplan}

name: add empty mission plan
make waypoint list
add wp to selected plan
func:
wps = global.get("waypoints")
wp = wps[msg.payload.name]

gs = global.get("gui_state")

node.warn("adding wp?")
gs.selected_plan.wp_names.push(wp.name)


return {payload:gs.selected_plan.name}

name: modify plan
delete selected plan
func:
plans = global.get("mission_plans")
gui_state = global.get("gui_state")
selected = gui_state.selected_plan

gui_state.selected_plan = null
delete plans[selected.name]

return {payload:null}

name: functions, because i dont want payloads and such here, just the enabled signal
vehicle_select
label: Vehicle
tooltip: Select a vehicle to control and stuff

name: vehicle_names
lines for current plan
func:
wps = msg.payload.waypoints
points = []
for(var i in wps){
        points.push([wps[i].lat, wps[i].lon])
}

switch(msg.payload.plan_state){
    case 0: //running
        c = "orange"
        w = 2
        break
    case 1: // stopped
        c = "red"
        w = 1
        break
    case 2: // paused
        c = "orange"
        w = 1
        break
    case 3: // emergency
        c = "red"
        w = 0.1
        break
    case 4: // received
        c = "yellow"
        w = 2
        break
}

line = {name: msg.vehicle_name+"_current_plan",
        layer: msg.vehicle_name,
        line:points,
        color:c,
        weight:w,
        editable:false,
        clickable:false,
        dashArray:"1,8,5,8"
}
return {payload:line}
rbe

return {selected:swp.name}
